00023 #ifndef THREADPP_MUTEX_H
00024 #define THREADPP_MUTEX_H
00025 
00026 #include "ThreadPrerequisites.h"
00027 
00028 namespace threadpp
00029 {
00031         class Mutex
00032         {
00033                 friend class Condition;
00034                 private:
00035 #if THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00036                         pthread_mutex_t mMutex;
00037 #elif THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00038                         CRITICAL_SECTION mMutex;
00039 #endif
00040                         THREADPP_INLINE void lock ()
00041                         {
00042 #if THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00043                                 pthread_mutex_lock(&mMutex);
00044 #elif THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00045                                 EnterCriticalSection (&mMutex);
00046 #endif
00047                         }
00048                         THREADPP_INLINE void unlock ()
00049                         {
00050 #if THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00051                                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&mMutex);
00052 #elif THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00053                                 LeaveCriticalSection (&mMutex);
00054 #endif
00055                         }
00056                 public:
00057                         class Lock
00058                         {
00059                                 friend class Condition;
00060                                 private:
00061                                         Mutex &mMutex;
00062                                         bool mLocked;
00063 
00064                                 public:
00068                                         THREADPP_INLINE Lock (Mutex &mutex, bool doLock=true) : mMutex(mutex), mLocked(false)
00069                                         {
00070                                                 if (doLock)
00071                                                         lock ();
00072                                         }
00074                                         THREADPP_INLINE void lock ()
00075                                         {
00076                                                 assert (!mLocked);
00077                                                 mMutex.lock ();
00078                                                 mLocked = true;
00079                                         }
00081                                         THREADPP_INLINE void unlock ()
00082                                         {
00083                                                 assert (mLocked);
00084                                                 mMutex.unlock ();
00085                                                 mLocked = false;
00086                                         }
00088                                         THREADPP_INLINE ~Lock ()
00089                                         {
00090                                                 if (mLocked)
00091                                                         unlock ();
00092                                         }
00093                         };
00094 
00096                         THREADPP_INLINE Mutex ()
00097                         {
00098 #if THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00099                                 pthread_mutex_init(&mMutex, NULL);
00100 #elif THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00101                                 InitializeCriticalSection (&mMutex);
00102 #endif
00103                         }
00105                         THREADPP_INLINE ~Mutex ()
00106                         {
00107 #if THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00108                                 pthread_mutex_destroy(&mMutex);
00109 #elif THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00110                                 DeleteCriticalSection (&mMutex);
00111 #endif
00112                         }
00113         };
00114 };
00115 
00116 #endif
